Treasure hunter Ben Gates and his father, Patrick, take great pride in their ancestors and their family&#039;s devotion to the United States. 

When Mitch Wilkinson produces a page from the diary of Lincoln assassin John Wilkes Booth allegedly linking Ben&#039;s great-great grandfather to the plot, Ben and Patrick set out on a path to clear their family&#039;s name. 

Ben also believes that the diary page contains hints to the whereabouts of a treasure map leading to an ancient city made of gold, and soon the hunt is on. 

Tech expert Riley Poole and Ben&#039;s now ex-girlfriend Abigail Chase join the Gates in their quest.

Cast: Nicolas Cage, Diane Kruger, Jon Voight, Helen Mirren.
